content.question: In the lines (“A large number . . . local situations”), the author implies that the compilation of Relaciones Geográficas and Descripciones

choices.label: helped to preserve elements of the indigenous artistic tradition
led to superficial comparisons between indigenous and European artworks
facilitated efforts to modify the political organization of the indigenous people
sparked a change in traditional religious beliefs among the indigenous people

content.answer: helped to preserve elements of the indigenous artistic tradition

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
